name: On Time Air Filters
tag_list: home-air-filter-replacement, replacing-hvac-filters, merv-8-filters, merv-11-filters, furnace-filters, air-conditioning-air-filters
overview:
On Time Air Filters (www.OnTimeAirFilters.com) offers routine home delivery of MERV 8 and MERV 11 air filters on schedule to help home owners ensure clean air, reduce energy costs, and extend the life of their HVAC systems.

On Time Air Filters offers a way for home owners to remember something they tend to forget. On Time Air Filters keeps homes, families, and HVAC systems healthy, while giving busy families one less thing to worry about during their precious free time.

On Time Air Filters solves a frustrating, time-consuming problem, providing convenience and peace of mind to homeowners and small landlords who want to make life easier for their tenants. By visiting www.ontimeairfilters.com, site users click through an â€œAir Filter Wizardâ€ â€“ entering the sizes of the air filter or filters in their home, naming each filter for easy installation when the shipment arrives, choosing a quality level for each filter – either high-efficiency MERV 8 filters (â€œbetterâ€) or MERV 11 filters (â€œbestâ€) – and deciding how often they want replacements delivered.

On Time Air Filters does the rest, delivering high-quality air filters on a customerâ€™s chosen schedule. And On Time Air Filters offers 65 home air filter sizes as â€œstandardâ€, three times the options offered by mass hardware retailers, all delivered at standard pricing and usually shipped in 48 hours.

On Time Air Filters reminder filter delivery service costs the same or less than timely replacement of air filters at prices charged by local hardware stores. OTAF also offers an extensive in-stock inventory of 65 air filter sizes (as much as three times the typical inventory at big box stores), deliverable within 48 hours of a customer placing an order.
